info.title: Eightfold
info.description: Eightfold custom connector for testing the endpoints

get.description: Given an ats position id, it returns all attributes of the ats position

put.description: To update the existing Ats Position in the System, include the ats position id in the params. Please Note: Update will overwrite existing fields. If empty fields are sent during an update, those fields will be wiped out

patch.description: Given an ats position id and data that needs to be patched, it patches the ats position. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.

get.description: Search ats positions using query parameters and get the complete ats position objects

post.description: To add a new ats position in the system, send the position information in the payload. ats position id will be sent back in case of a successful response

get.description: Given a position id, it returns all attributes of the position

put.description: To update the existing Position in the System, include the positionId in the params. Please Note: Update will overwrite existing fields. If empty fields are sent during an update, those fields will be wiped out

patch.description: Given a position id and data that needs to be patched, it patches the position. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.

get.description: Search positions using query parameters and get the complete position objects.

post.description: To add a new position in the system, send the position information in the payload. positionId will be sent back in case of a successful response

get.description: Returns all the matching candidates for a position based on the filter query params provided in the API request. NOTE: The output may differ from UI pages as those pages may use additional configs, that are configured separately. Top 1000 Leads can be requested using the leads query parameter.
Returns all the matching applicants for a position

post.description: Batch fetch positions for a given list of position ids (limit 100)

get.description: Given a transaction id, it returns the status and encoded entity id of the transaction, status can be PASS, IN PROGRESS or FAIL in the past 3 days
Given a profile id of a candidate, it returns all attributes of the profile

delete.description: Deletes a specific profile given a profile id

put.description: To update the existing Profile(Candidate/Employee) in the System, include the profileId in the params. Please Note: Update will overwrite existing fields. If empty fields are sent during an update, those fields will be wiped out

get.description: Search profiles using query parameters and get the complete profile objects

post.description: This API creates a profile with the given data in the payload

get.description: Returns all the matching positions for a profile

post.summary: Creates or advances an application stage
post.description: Create or advance application stage for a given profile and position
Batch fetch profiles for a given list of profile ids (limit 100)

get.description: Given the key for an attachment, it fetches the attachment in octet-stream format.
For a given profile id, fetch suggested skills for a particular profile section. Supported profile sections are 'experience', 'education', 'projects'.
Returns roles for a specified section. Possible values of sections are preferred-roles and recommended-roles

patch.description: Patch preferred role for a user. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.

get.summary: Career Planner Skill Gap Analysis Get
get.description: Skill gap analysis data which includes present skills and recommeded skills for the provided role and current user profile
Return recommended course for the current user and selected role pair
Returns career navigator recommended career paths
Given a profile feedback id of a candidate, it returns all attributes of the profile feedback

post.description: Batch fetch profile feedbacks for a given list of feedback ids (limit 100)

get.description: Search profile feedbacks using specific filter parameters and get all attributes of profile feedbacks objects
Given a profile note id of a candidate, it returns all attributes of the profile note

post.description: Batch fetch profile notes for a given list of note ids (limit 100)

get.description: Search profile notes using specific filter parameters and get the complete profile note objects
Given a profile tag id of a candidate, it returns all attributes of the profile tag

post.description: Batch fetch profile tags for a given list of tag ids (limit 100)

get.description: Search profile tags using specific filter parameters and get all profile tag objects
Given a profile application id, it returns all attributes of the profile application

post.description: Batch fetch profile applications for a given list of applications ids (limit 100)

get.description: Search profile applications using specific filter parameters and get all attributes of profile applications.
Given a user message id, it returns all attributes of the user message

post.description: Batch fetch user messages for a given list of user message ids (limit 100)

get.description: Search user messages using specific filter parameters and get all attributes of entities
Given the id of email delivery feedback, it returns all attributes of the entity

post.description: Batch fetch email delivery feedbacks for a given list of entity ids (limit 100)

get.description: Search Email Delivery Feedbacks using specific filter parameters and get all attributes of the entity objects
Given an ats candidate id of a candidate, it returns the ats candidate object

put.description: To update the existing ats candidate, include the ats_candidate_id in the params. Please Note: Update will overwrite existing fields. If empty fields are sent during an update, those fields will be wiped out

patch.description: Given an ats candidate id and data that needs to be patched, it patches the ats candidate. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.

get.description: Search ats candidates using query parameters and get the complete ats candidate objects

post.description: To add a new ats candidate in the system, send the candidate information in the payload. ats candidate id will be sent back in case of a successful response

get.description: Given a campaign id, it returns all attributes of the user campaign

post.description: Batch fetch user campaigns for a given list of campaign ids (limit 100)

get.description: Search user campaigns using specific filter parameters and get all attributes of entitie
Given a course id of a course, it returns the course object

delete.description: Deletes a specific course given a course id. Note: It may take some time for the newly deleted courses to disappear from LIST call, as there may be indexing delays. You can still use the GET BY ID call right after deletion of course to confirm the deletion of the course.

patch.description: Given an course id and data that needs to be patched, it patches the course. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.

get.description: Search courses using query parameters and get the complete course object. recommendedFor feature does not support query addition. Note: It may take some time for the newly deleted courses to disappear from LIST call, as there may be indexing delays. You can still use the GET BY ID call right after deletion of course to confirm the deletion of the course.

post.description: Does creation for a course

get.description: Given the id of User Calendar Event, it returns all attributes of the entity

post.description: Batch fetch user calendar events for a given list of entity ids (limit 100)

get.description: Search User Calendar Events using specific filter parameters and get all attributes of the entity objects
Given an event activity id of a candidate, it returns all attributes of the event activity

post.description: Batch fetch event candidate activity for a given list of entity ids (limit 100)

get.description: Search event candidate activities using specific filter parameters and get all attributes of the entities
A get call for listing planned events data

post.description: Batch fetch planned events for a given list of planned event ids (limit 100)

get.description: Given a planned event id, it returns all attributes of the planned event
Returns profile insights

post.description: Post a query with different filters for talent traits. All the values in the same filter is treated as an OR operation, while all the values in a different filter is treated as an AND operation.

get.description: Returns Diversity insights of employees of an organization
Given an email id or employee id of an employee, it returns the HRIS employee information
List call that returns all the employee profiles.

post.description: Allowing the candidate to join talent pool

get.description: Given a role Id of a role, it returns the employee role

post.description: Create an employee role in Eightfold

get.description: Given an Id of a role, it returns the JIE role for the same

delete.description: Deletes a specific role given a role id

get.description: This endpoint returns a list of roles. If a new role is created, it takes some time to show up in the list call, you can fetch that role using get endpoints right after the creation of role

post.description: Create a role in Eightfold

get.description: This endpoint returns succession plan information for group id of a current user.
Given a user id of a user, it returns the user object

delete.description: Deletes a specific user given a user id

patch.description: Given a user id of a user with user data, it patches the user object. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.

get.description: Returns a list of users

post.description: Create an User in Eightfold. email, firstName and lastName cannot be empty strings while creating an User. Note: It may take some time for the newly created users to start reflecting in LIST calls, as there may be indexing delays. You can still use the GET BY ID call right after creation of users.
Batch fetch users for a given list of user ids (limit 100)

get.description: This API fetches modified entity ids given a time frame.
Given a profile id of a employee, it returns all attributes of the employee

patch.description: Patches employee given its profile_id. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.
Patches employee given its employee id. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.

get.description: List call that returns all the employee profiles.

post.description: Creates a new employee  This is an Async operation where a successful (2xx) HTTP response does not guarantee that the operation will succeed.
Batch fetch employees for a given list of profile ids

get.description: Given a profile ID of an employee, return recommended mentors
List call that returns employees match scores against their current roles.
Given a position ID of the succession plan, return attributes of the plan

delete.description: Deletes a succession plan specified by the Eightfold position ID

patch.description: Update existing succession plan's metadata. Refer to request schema for fields that can be updated. For updating successors and caretakers, please use the dedicated successor and caretaker endpoints

get.description: Get a list of recommended successors for the specified succession plan given a position ID
Search and get a list of succession plans based on the search parameters given

post.description: Creates a new succession plan

get.description: Get a list of incumbents of the succession plan. The plan is specified by the position ID in the request path.

post.description: An employee is added as a successor in the succession plan. The employee must be a valid and existing employee profile in Eightfold.

delete.description: Delete a successor from the succession plan.

patch.description: Patch a successor in the succession plan. The successor's attributes are updated with new data given in the request.

post.description: Add an employee as a new caretaker to the succession plan. The employee must be a valid and existing employee profile on Eightfold.

delete.description: Delete a caretaker from the succession plan.

get.description: Given a demand id, it returns all attributes of the demand

patch.description: Patches demand given its id. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.

get.description: Search demands using query parameters and get the complete demand objects

post.description: Create a new Demand
Batch fetch demands for a given list of demand ids

get.description: Given a external demand id, it returns all attributes of the external demand

delete.description: Deletes external demand given its id.

put.description: Updates external demand given its id

patch.description: Patches external demand given its id. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.

get.description: Search external demands using query parameters and get the complete external demand objects

post.description: Create a new External Demand
Create or advance application stage of an employee using their employee ID

get.description: Given a Booking id, it returns all attributes of the Booking

delete.description: Deletes a booking given its id.

put.description: Updates a booking given its id.

patch.description: Patches a booking given its id. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.

get.description: Search bookings using query parameters and get the complete booking objects. Atleast one of employeeEmail or demandId is required in filters.

post.description: Create a new Booking
Batch fetch bookings for a given list of booking ids

get.description: Given an external booking id, it returns all attributes of the external booking

delete.description: Deletes external booking given its id.

put.description: Updates external booking given its id.

patch.description: Patches external booking given its id. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.

post.description: Create a new External Booking

get.description: Given a Holiday id, it returns all attributes of the Holiday

delete.description: Deletes a holiday given its id.

put.description: Updates a holiday given its id.

patch.description: Patches a holiday given its id. Note: All required body params in the schema are not enforced in PATCH request, unlike path params.

get.description: Search holidays using query parameters and get the complete holiday objects.

post.description: Create a new Holiday
Batch fetch holidays for a given list of holiday ids

get.description: Given an Org Unit id, it returns all attributes of the Org Unit
Search org units using query parameters and get the complete org unit objects

post.description: Batch fetch org units for a given list of org unit ids
